nodes.title: TV24 – Website redesign and more feature implementation
nodes.content:
TV24 website design development and implementation by creating a WordPress theme that is configurable and editable for site admin

The first task was to improve the previus website design which was achieved with Figma platform by giving transparency of work progress to the client.

After design approval with a client, we proceeded further with a website implementation. The custom development peace which we don’t face in every project is TV program implementation together with a nice, understandable UI design for end-user. Worth mentioning that we included a blog section in the website which is editable and customizable as all of the other sections.
